refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Mean-Shift clustering algorithm is a nonparametric clustering technique which does not require the prior knowledge of the number of clusters, and does not constrain the shape of the clusters. It's a practical application of the mode finding procedure. This function msclustering realizes the mean-shift clustering algorithm with a flat kernel.
